footer.tagline: Upgrading cybersecurity with explainable multi-agent systems

hero.headline: Where Artificial Intelligence meets collective intelligence
hero.paragraph1: We service cars and run fire drills before anything goes wrong — then wait for the real incident to tell us what we missed. Cyber teams run the same script: build controls, wait for alerts, react.
hero.paragraph2: ColleaiQ is our push in the opposite direction: simulated attacks, AI agents trained on your own SOC analysts' decisions, and a feedback loop that closes itself. Less noise, more clarity, and a team that gets better with every drill.

mission.headline: Building explainable multi-agent systems for proactive cyber defense
mission.paragraph1: ColleaiQ is a Danish startup building explainable multi-agent AI systems that simulate cyber incidents, train on SOC analyst decisions, and deliver proactive security — no black boxes, no noise.
mission.paragraph2: We started ColleaiQ because we believe cyber teams deserve tools that explain their reasoning, learn from real analyst decisions, and work with the team — not against them.

solution.headline: Train agents. Run simulations. Close the loop.
solution.description: Our platform simulates adversary tactics in a safe sandbox, trains AI agents on SOC analyst decisions, and generates explainable findings — closing the feedback loop between learning and action.

team.headline: Meet the founders
team.description: Three engineers who believe cyber teams deserve tools that explain their reasoning and work with the team — not against them.

ready.headline: Ready to upgrade your cyber defense?
ready.description: Let's talk about how explainable AI agents can help your SOC team stay ahead.

careers.headline: Open Positions
careers.intro: We're a small team and we hire rarely and deliberately. There are no open roles right now.
careers.thesisDescription: We're keen to partner with Master's thesis or PhD students on topics like explainable multi-agent systems, sandboxed cyber simulations, model evaluation/reproducibility, reinforcement learning, graph analytics, and auditability for NIS2. We can offer real problem statements, synthetic/bench data, weekly check-ins, and co-authorship where relevant.
careers.interestedDescription: Use the Contact page to write us a short note (e.g., "Thesis/PhD partnership" or "Future roles").

contact.headline: Contact ColleaiQ
contact.description: We're here to answer questions, discuss pilots, or explore thesis/PhD partnerships. Reach out below.
contact.formSuccess: Thank you for your message. We'll get back to you soon!
contact.demoDescription: Want to see our platform in action? Schedule a demo with our team.
